Model: MI Poco M2 Pro (Green and Greener, 6GB RAM, 64GB Storage)
comment: The phone arrived today.There is a considerable amount of bloatware - MI apps/junk.The build quality is medium - mostly plastic.The camera is also not bad but it blurs and does applies beautify filters, which I am sure I don't like, have to turn this off, or the pictures look unnatural.The display seems to be crisp enough, and the phone itself is pretty snappy (right now).Call quality is crisp, I don't have VoLTE in my locality though.The Green and Greener look is nice.The phone charges really fast.Like I mentioned earlier, the phone arrived today, so I am not sure how the phone will age.There are other good phones in this category that offer very much the same, for instance the Moto One Power, which would definitely have less bloatware.Overall, considering this is a phone that will be used moderately - It is not bad.Except for the bloatware!
